name: BTLx From Parameters
description: Generates a feature from BTLx parameters.

inputParameters.name: element
inputParameters.description: Element to apply BTLx feature to.

inputParameters.name: ref_side
inputParameters.description: integer 0-5 corresponding to BTLx reference side 1-6.

outputParameters.name: Feature
outputParameters.description: Feature Definition. Should connect to CT_Model features input.

outputParameters.name: Preview
outputParameters.description: Preview of geometry resulting from aplying BTLxProcesssing on element. Depending on joinery operations, this might not mathc the final geometry.
